name: Class definition
prompt:
Add a public class called Person to Domain.calr with a simple structure. The class should be empty for now (we'll add members in other tests).

Use this exact Calor class definition syntax:
§CL{c001:Person:pub}
§/CL{c001}

The §CL{id:name:visibility} syntax defines a class:
- id is a unique class identifier (c001, c002, etc.)
- name is the class name
- visibility is pub (public), priv (private), or int (internal)
- §/CL{id} closes the class definition
